name: Vine Restrain
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] envía enredaderas [AttackerHisOrHer], ¡y se envuelven y restringen [TargetYouOrMonsterName]!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] sends out [AttackerHisOrHer] vines, but [TargetYouOrMonsterName] manage to keep them off!
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] squirms against [AttackerName]'s vines, barely resisting the urge to settle into the restraints...
restraintEscaped: [TargetName] manages to tear off the restraining vines!
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] remains bound by the tight vines!
